title: North Carolina Firm Recalls Chicken Salad Products Due To Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 7, 2012 - Bost Distributing Company doing business as Harold Food Company, a Bear Creek, N.C. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,200 pounds of chicken salad products. The products contain eggs that are the subject of a Food and Drug Administration (FDA) recall due...
impacted_products: 30-lb. boxes of "Harold Food Co. Grand Strand Deluxe Chicken Salad."
